SEARCH
Package Logic

Class Game

java.lang.Object
Logic.Game
public class Game extends Object
Game is the main class that controls the game logic. It manages the game board, characters, score, and game timer.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructs a new Game instance based on a matrix read from a file.

  • Constructor Details

    • Game

      public Game()
      Default constructor for the Game class. Used for testing functionality. Creates a game board, a Cyborg, a list of monsters, a list of rewards, a list of punishments, and a game timer.

    • Game

      public Game(String filename) throws FileNotFoundException
      Constructs a new Game instance based on a matrix read from a file. The matrix represents the game board, where 0's represent walls and 1's represent open tiles. The game also initializes an empty list of monsters, rewards, and punishments, and sets the initial score to 0. A new GameTimer and GameGUI are also created for this game. A bonus reward is spawned and the game tick is started.
      Parameters:
      filename - The name of the file containing the matrix.
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - If the file cannot be found.

  • Method Details

    • startGame

      public void startGame()
      Starts the game. Starts the timer, places the Cyborg and Monsters on the board, and starts the game loop.

    • endGame

      public void endGame()
      Ends the game. Stops the timer and concludes the game.

    • getBoard

      public Board getBoard()
      Returns the game board.
      Returns:
      The game board.

    • getRewards

      public List<Reward> getRewards()
      Returns the list of rewards in the game.
      Returns:
      The list of rewards in the game.

    • getPunishments

      public List<Punishment> getPunishments()
      Returns the list of punishments in the game.
      Returns:
      The list of punishments in the game.

    • getScore

      public int getScore()
      Retrieves the current score of the game.
      Returns:
      the current score.

    • getBonusScore

      public int getBonusScore()
      Retrieves the current bonus score of the game.
      Returns:
      the current bonus score.

    • updateScore

      public void updateScore(int score)
      Updates the score.
      Parameters:
      score - The score to be added.

    • updateBonusScore

      public void updateBonusScore(int score)
      Updates the bonus score.
      Parameters:
      score - The score to be added.

    • moveCharacter

      public void moveCharacter(GameCharacter character, Direction direction)
      Moves a game character in a specified direction. If the character is a monster and tries to move into a cell occupied by another monster, or tries to move into the entrance/exit, the move is reverted. If the new position is a wall, the move is also reverted.
      Parameters:
      character - The game character to move.
      direction - The direction to move the character in.

    • moveMonsters

      public void moveMonsters()
      Moves each monster in the game. If a monster is within 10 units of the Cyborg, it moves towards the Cyborg. Otherwise, it moves in a random direction.

    • moveTowardsCyborg

      public void moveTowardsCyborg(Monster monster)
      Moves a monster towards the Cyborg. The monster moves either horizontally or vertically towards the Cyborg, chosen randomly. If the monster is to the right of the Cyborg, it moves left. If it's to the left, it moves right. If the monster is below the Cyborg, it moves up. If it's above, it moves down.
      Parameters:
      monster - The monster to move.

    • keyPress

      public void keyPress(KeyEvent keyEvent)
      Handles key press events. Moves the Cyborg based on the key pressed.
      Parameters:
      keyEvent - The key event.

    • grantRewardToCyborg

      public void grantRewardToCyborg(Reward reward)
      Grants a reward to the Cyborg. If the reward is a RegularReward, the Cyborg's score is increased. If the reward is a BonusReward, the bonus score is updated and the reward is removed from the reward list. If the reward is an InvincibilityState, the Cyborg gains invincibility. If the reward is a ProtectiveCover, the Cyborg gains a protective cover.
      Parameters:
      reward - The reward to grant to the Cyborg.

    • getCyborg

      public Cyborg getCyborg()
      Returns the Cyborg in the game.
      Returns:
      The Cyborg in the game.

    • getMonsters

      public List<Monster> getMonsters()
      Returns the list of monsters in the game.
      Returns:
      The list of monsters in the game.

    • increaseScore

      public void increaseScore()
      Increases the score of the game by 1.

    • decreaseScore

      public void decreaseScore(int n)
      Decreases the score of the game by a specified amount.
      Parameters:
      n - The amount to decrease the score by.

    • increaseBonusScore

      public void increaseBonusScore()
      Increases the bonus score of the game by 1.

    • checkTotalScore

      public void checkTotalScore()
      Checks the total score of the game. If the total score (score + bonus score) is less than 0, the game ends and a message is printed to the console.

    • spawnBonusReward

      public void spawnBonusReward()
      Spawns a bonus reward in the game. The bonus reward is placed in a random cell that is not a wall, entrance, exit, or occupied by another interactable.

    • checkBonus

      public void checkBonus()
      Checks the status of the bonus reward in the game. If a bonus reward has not been spawned, there is a low chance to spawn one. If a bonus reward has been spawned and its duration is over 10000, it is removed from the game and a message is printed to the console.

    • checkInteractions

      public void checkInteractions()
      Checks for interactions between characters in the game. If a Cyborg and a Monster are in the same cell, the game ends. If a Cyborg and a Punishment are in the same cell, the Cyborg's score is decreased and the Punishment is removed. If a Cyborg and a Reward are in the same cell, the Reward is granted to the Cyborg and removed from the game. If the Cyborg is in the exit cell and the score is 4, the game ends and the player wins.

    • gameLoop

      public void gameLoop()
      The game loop. Runs the game tick at a fixed rate.

    • isGameRunning

      public boolean isGameRunning()
      Checks if the game is currently running.
      Returns:
      true if the game is running, false otherwise.
